игра копец кокая классссная проста апупеная игра я играю в ниЁ каждэй день в мире нет игры лудшэ этой игры

SERIOUS SHORT REVIEW

This game is great. It will never drop below 60fps on any PC. It is a full game. No skins, name tags, operation X passes, or any other useless micro-transactions that CS:GO has. It has enough players to be considered alive, has lots of maps and gamemodes (I found a deathrun server) and mic support without angry russians yelling and kicking you. As of me writing this review, the game is £0.69 ($1), meaning that I can gift it to all my friends and have fun times playing old Counter-Strike.

Great choice for £6.99 ($10)
ABSOLUTE STEAL FOR £0.69 ($1)

No hace falta que diga nada sobre este juego, todo el mundo sabe qué es Counter-Strike y que marcó una era, sin dudas uno de los mejores y más importantes FPS multijugadores que existieron por lo que significó para muchos y para lo que es a día de hoy.
Sempre .. gostei.. de jogar... cs.. e esses ultimos.. dias.. jogando diariamente.. so aumentam meu vicio..

это уникальная дисциплина 
для поклонников физики Counter-Strike 1.6. 

Целый ряд особенностей движка открывает 
перед Вами широкий спектр возможностей, 
которые позволят Вам быстро и эффективно 
передвигаться в игре. 

Проходите карты на время, ставьте рекорды по 
дальности прыжка при помощи различных техник. 
Совершенствуйте свои навыки в игре и 
совершенствуйтесь сами.

I just bought the Rainbow Six Siege complete eddition on uplay (were boycotting ubi for years) because these days ubisoft somewhat less greedy and intitled than valve corportation! What a crazy world we live in these days. 

Who would of guess that valve corporation will become that unethical micro-gambling piece of wasted human potential? Sure, money is good but video games always have been something more. It is a form of modern art.

At this stage valve corporation doesn't think that video games is a form of art but rather a form of business.

Art can't exist without sacrifice. And current valve employees are unwilling to sacrifice this cash cow in the name of art. 

Valve employees - don't you have enough millions stacked at this point? 

What a petty.
One of the greatest first person shooters of all time.  A timeless classic.

the clunky movement and graphics that literally hurt to look at are not the only problems with this game, not even close. now, we all know that if this wasnt made by your precious little valve studios you wouldnt even give this game the time of day. "but because its by the people that made half life that means it has to be good, right"? CS GO is only 5 more dollars and for that you get much more content and you also can have gun skins, deathmatch mode, casual mode, and competetive mode, and it has about 10x the graphics. first person shooters have come a long way since this games release...

Игра вышла в двухтысячных, а я еще не родился (даже не был в планах).
Помню еще когда только играл в 1.6 и была моей самой любимой игрой. Но после того как я узнал о "GO" забросил 1.6. Изредка так захожу что бы вспомнить что тогда вытворял.

[h1]Details[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]Infommercial: if you want to play the original Counter-Strike, but don't like Steam Achievements, then this is the game for you.[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1789185591 
Play as either Terrorists or Counter-Terrorists in this classic FPS one-shot kill LAN team-combat game. The maps are legendary. The game is endlessly replayable.

[/quote]
[h1]Summary[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]Still download for the occasional blast, but it's an intimidating fanbase...
buy Source instead: get some achievements to alleviate the punishing experience![/h1]
Pros:
- it's a blast
- it is the original

Cons:
- you will be owned by people half your age, or stumble into a pro-team and get baited a lot.
- Counter-Strike Source IS this game, but wiht Steam Achievements.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1748238549
[/quote]

好吧，站在当今steam平台，不得不说这款游戏画质差，模型粗糙。。。
但它的影响不在今日，它的影响在整个FPS游戏的历史上。
现实生活中有一款游戏叫“真人CS”，即使在我们中国有着用户比CS多好多倍的CF或其他游戏。
可他们的影响太小了，我从没见过“真人CF”。
要玩CS？？？
算了吧！！！
这是收藏的东西，怀旧的东西。。。你可以买到它把它压箱底。
但不要玩盗版CS，也不要说它与什么比起来差很多，，，它的影响可不比第一台触屏手机影响小
